name: StudentRecruiting-Values-GET-getUnitType
description: [Student Recruiting] GET /values/academicRequirementEvaluation/unitType/ — Retrieves instances that can be used as values for other endpoint parameters in this service. Secured by: Manage: Student Prospect Academic Requirement Evaluation Scope: Admissions

schema.name: academicLevel
schema.description: The academic level of the program of study.

schema.name: academicUnit
schema.description: The academic unit of the program of study.

schema.name: effectiveDate
schema.description: The date to filter programs of study that are effective, using the yyyy-mm-dd format.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default and maximum is 1000.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

schema.name: programOfStudyType
schema.description: The program type of the program of study.
